verses.verse: (A Psalm.) O Sing<WH7891> to the Lord<WH3068> a new<WH2319> song,<WH7892> For He has done<WH6213> wonderful<WH6381> things,<WH6381> His right<WH3225> hand<WH3225> and His holy<WH6944> arm<WH2220> have gained<WH3467> the victory<WH3467> for Him.
The Lord<WH3068> has made<WH3045> known<WH3045> His salvation;<WH3444> He has revealed<WH1540> His righteousness<WH6666> in the sight<WH5869> of the nations.<WH1471>

He has remembered<WH2142> His lovingkindness<WH2617> and His faithfulness<WH530> to the house<WH1004> of Israel;<WH3478> All<WH3605> the ends<WH657> of the earth<WH776> have seen<WH7200> the salvation<WH3444> of our God.<WH430>
Shout<WH7321> joyfully<WH7321> to the Lord,<WH3068> all<WH3605> the earth;<WH776> Break<WH6476> forth<WH6476> and sing<WH7442> for joy<WH7442> and sing<WH2167> praises.<WH2167>
Sing<WH2167> praises<WH2167> to the Lord<WH3068> with the lyre;<WH3658> With the lyre<WH3658> and the sound<WH6963> of melody.<WH2172>
With trumpets<WH2689> and the sound<WH6963> of the horn<WH7782> Shout<WH7321> joyfully<WH7321> before<WH6440> the King,<WH4428> the Lord.<WH3068>
Let the sea<WH3220> roar<WH7481> and all<WH4393> it contains,<WH4393> The world<WH8398> and those who dwell<WH3427> in it.
Let the rivers<WH5104> clap<WH4222> their hands;<WH3709> Let the mountains<WH2022> sing<WH7442> together<WH3162> for joy<WH7442>

Before<WH6440> the Lord;<WH3068> for He is coming<WH935> to judge<WH8199> the earth;<WH776> He will judge<WH8199> the world<WH8398> with righteousness,<WH6664> And the peoples<WH5971> with equity.<WH4339>
